content.rendered:
Hey everyone! Right now, the draft events I posted about a month ago are in the process of being finalized, with artwork! You can find all of the event cards in the following galleries. Let me know what you think in the comments below!

jetpack-related-posts.title: Newly drafted events!
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Hey everyone! Recently the decision was made to overhaul the sleep and event system to create a faster game. Essentially, on your turn you play an event card from your hand. The effect happens, and then you can take actions equal to the number written on each card in the…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Is an Octopus or an Elephant better at Baseball? Champions of the Wild Review
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Rules In the base game of the Champion of the Wild, players are given seven animal cards and must choose one to compete in three randomly drawn event cards. Players must argue for their chosen animal in each of the events (ranging from serious sports, like 200m sprints, to more…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Components List and Changes
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Hey everyone! I'm back from hiatus with a list of the components in Daggers High. I've decided to do one post each week on Fridays, starting next week, so look out for those! A couple of notes on the components. I made a couple of changes to the sizes and…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Sophomore deck changes
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Hey everyone! Today we will be discussing a few of the changes with the Sophomore deck. Sophomore year was designed to be reflective of sophomore year at my school: more difficult classes and less support. Even though the Sophomore deck has a lot more total action points than the Freshman…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Purchase Daggers High on The Game Crafter
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Hi everyone! I thought that I would just take a moment to share the new progress I've had with Daggers High. You may be aware that Daggers High recently launched and failed on Kickstarter. Although this was disappointing, I still wanted to find a way to get Daggers High into…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Playtest- Essays too powerful?
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Hi everyone! Recently I had a play test with four second-time players. It's very helpful to get people to play the game multiple times to see if they enjoy the changes- I really appreciate it! There were a couple main take-aways from this playtest. Firstly, I finally started keeping track…
